nodes.bodyText: You don't want unnecessary change like this?
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -2,7 +2,7 @@ - {{ column.header }} + {{ column.header }}

nodes.bodyText:
I forgot to mention in the title, but this makes the layout looks better, with a spacing between the header and the arrows.
Old one was something like this
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -2,7 +2,7 @@ - {{ column.header }} + {{ column.header }}

nodes.bodyText: I see. Then I think a proper fix is to use CSS style rather than a space.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -2,7 +2,7 @@ - {{ column.header }} + {{ column.header }}
@@ -2,7 +2,7 @@ - {{ column.header }} + {{ column.header }}
